website_summaries.verdict: For hundreds less than its Windows near-equivalent, the Lenovo Yoga Chromebook C630 features a sweet, versatile 4K display on an all-around solid laptop.
pros: Excellent 4K display that’s a joy to use in laptop and tablet mode
Very solid performance and battery life
cons: The keyboard is a bit mushy
You can’t run those few Windows- and MacOS-only applications on the Chrome operating system

customer_reviews.title: NO HDMI Port - Not In Product Description
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, there is NO HDMI port available on this notebook. I think it is fine for a computer manufacturer to show what the device has. But they need to also say- HDMI port - NONE If there is a way to connect an external monitor or two, then hopefully someone from Lenovo will respond to my unhappiness.
customer_reviews.author: Peer

customer_reviews.title: No backlit keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Not the latest model as it does'nt have a backlit keyboard, other than that it's a fine piece of kit
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Very adequate Chromebook for work
customer_reviews.text: Dimensions I was a bit worried about this but the size is quite comfortable to work with and the weight is really not so much an issue. Screen The resolution is good with very crisp text and fine color and brightness. Keyboard Very responsive with comfortable keys in size and travel. Trackpad Very good and precise. Responsiveness It is quite good with the i5 processor. I have installed some Linus apps as well and they work fine. Quirks Some Android games only display a black screen. When copying files to an external UBS stick formatted as ExFAT, the process simply stop with no error messages at all. All surfaces are very receptive to fingerprints.
customer_reviews.author: Héctor Yáñez

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate description
customer_reviews.text: There is no backlit keyboard on mine even though the description clearly states that feature is included
customer_reviews.author: Matt P.

customer_reviews.title: Load all you want it's gonna stay fast.
customer_reviews.text: I can not imagine there's a faster chromebook far less built this good. Sometimes I like to see a cooler screen when I'm surfing but I use a color temp changer extension. Looking at my task manager it stays at a very low level. Naturally I group my apps and extensions into a picker extension which also allows quick disable all. As long as I rarely ever have to grant access to my gmail I don't sweat the numerous apps+exts I have. Usually I could care less if insteathrough FB.. or Twitter if on android ..totally other topic.. but yeh whizzes through everything even with all my junk.
customer_reviews.author: rstackoor

customer_reviews.title: Great overall computer
customer_reviews.text: Everything I need in a computer: fast streaming, lightweight, great touchscreen, and great price
customer_reviews.author: El

customer_reviews.title: 3 USB-C
customer_reviews.text: 1st of all HDMI is history. USB-C is 4k and 1080P. The Yoga has 3 USB-C. If you have HDMI you can get a little converter HDMI to USB-C. This device is super fast and just as good or better than any Chromebook on eethe market. This is the Chromebook King. My only complaint is no illuminated keyboard on the 1080P Full HD Model.
customer_reviews.author: kmbiscus

customer_reviews.title: Could be great but really isn't
customer_reviews.text: The display brightness on the FHD model (I guess that goes for the 4K too) is disappointing, especially in rendering photos. Also the display shows vertical lines in blues. In general the screen look grayish and dirty, without any crispness. Lenovo has made this powerful laptop with very good internals and then slapped a cheap display on it, if you like good brightness then don't buy this laptop, it will disappoint you thoroughly, no one can work on a display that just not bright enough, regardless of the processing goodness.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Belelius

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic machine - Best in class!
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful machine it is. Best specs in the market. This laptop is rock solid. You don't want to pay hundreds of dollars for a plastic. This is all aluminium body - very well built. Fast and clean looking. i5 with 8GB RAM is enough to carry out any work. I compared many Chromebooks and ended up picking this one. This is much better than chromebook. Fold this book and it becomes the biggest tablet you can wish for. Extremely happy with this purchase. Much faster than a windows laptop and much cheaper than an apple mac book.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Good laptop but not reliable screen.
customer_reviews.text: Over an excellent laptop. Didn’t buy it here. How ever I went through 2 of the yoga’s until I actually gave up on them. Both had screens not working. If connected to an external screen the external screen works but big time issue with its on board screen. Didn’t get supper to resolve this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Manish Thapa

customer_reviews.title: Way to expensive for a Chromebook
customer_reviews.text: Come on, it is a Chromebook not a real computer. The one I tried was slow and limited. If price is your main issue get a Chromebook but they are not worth this much.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer
